markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow of the Wilds](/Feats.aspx?ID=1042) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 54 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

It’s difficult to notice your passage through wild areas. As long as you’re not in an urban environment, you’re always considered to be [Covering Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=65), even if you chose a different activity in exploration mode.
name: Shadow of the Wilds
